Export.Routine:
WWWBUTCHECK ;WWWBUTCHECK;PRÜFT DIE BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG;BEC;11.12.2002 ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; PRÜFT DIE BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 21-Nov-2005 GRF Correct dot levels ; 02-Sep-2005 JW SR12966: WWW124/WWW120 are shared ; 11.12.2002 BEC ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW VORG DO VAR DO HEAD DO SORT DO ANZ DO CHECK DO ERGEBNIS ;KILL WWWSOR(YUSER) KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) ;SR13246 IF VORG(6)=1 DO NOCHMAL QUIT HEAD ;STARTEN UND VARIABLEN HOLEN SET UES(1)="" SET UES(1)=$$^WWWTEXT(199)_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME("WWW124","D","1")_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME("WWW124","P","2")_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(31406)_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(179) ; TABELLE SPRACHE (EIGEN) BUTTON BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG SPRACHE POS BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG SET UES(2)="" SET UES(2)=" "_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(199)_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME("WWW124","D","1")_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME("WWW124","P","2")_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(31406)_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(179)_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(33029)_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32914) ;SPRACHE (FREMD) BUTTON BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG SPRACHE quit VAR ;VARIABLEN HOLEN ODER SPEICHERN NEW VARIABLEN SET VORG(1)="",VORG(2)="",VORG(3)="",VORG(4)="",VORG(5)="",VORG(6)="" SET VARIABLEN=$PIECE($GET(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1)),Y,11) SET VORG(1)=$PIECE(VARIABLEN,"#",1) SET VORG(2)=$PIECE(VARIABLEN,"#",2) SET VORG(3)=$PIECE(VARIABLEN,"#",3) SET VORG(4)=$PIECE(VARIABLEN,"#",4) SET VORG(5)=$PIECE(VARIABLEN,"#",5) SET VORG(6)=$PIECE(VARIABLEN,"#",6) QUIT SORT ;VORSORTIEREN ; ;KILL WWWSOR(YUSER) KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) ;SR13246 NEW FORM SET BUT1="" SET BUT2="" IF VORG(3)="" DO . SET FORM="" . FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . . SET ^WWWSOR(YUSER,1,FORM,1)="" new YI IF VORG(3)'="" DO . SET YI="" . FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(VORG(3),",",YI,99)="" DO . . if $data(^WWW124(0,$PIECE(VORG(3),",",YI),SPRACHE,1,1)) SET ^WWWSOR(YUSER,1,$$^WWWUMLAU($PIECE(VORG(3),",",YI)),1)="" ;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv Effectively Disabled block IF VORG(2)'="" DO . SET YI="" . FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(VORG(2),",",YI,99)="" DO . . ;I $D(^WWW124(0,$P(VORG(2),",",YI),SPRACHE,1,1)) SET ^WWWSOR(YUSER,1,$$^WWWUMLAU($P(VORG(2),",",YI)),1)="" ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Effectively Disabled block QUIT CHECK ;PRÜFEN ; NEW BUT1,BUT2,BUT,ERROR,ANZ,ERROR1,YI,ERGEBNISS,ERROR2 SET $PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,1)=0 SET $PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,2)=0 SET $PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,3)=0 SET FORM="" FOR SET FORM=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1,FORM)) QUIT:FORM="" DO . SET ANZ=0 . SET ERROR="" SET ERROR1="" SET ERROR2="" . ; vvv . ; FIXME : why is there extra code here in WWWBUTTONCHECK? Why two routines? . SET BUTNR="" . FOR SET BUTNR=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,SPRACHE,BUTNR)) QUIT:BUTNR="" DO . . SET ERROR="" . . SET ERROR2="" . . SET BUT1=$GET(^WWW124(0,FORM,SPRACHE,BUTNR,1)) . . SET BUT2="" IF $DATA(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)) SET BUT2=$GET(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)) . . IF '$DATA(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)) SET ERROR=1 SET ERROR1=1 QUIT . . ; . . IF $PIECE(BUT1,Y,1)=$PIECE(BUT2,Y,1) IF $PIECE(BUT2,Y,60)'=1 SET ERROR=1 ;GLEICHE BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG . . FOR YI=2:1 QUIT:$PIECE(BUT1,Y,YI,99)="" DO . . . IF $PIECE(BUT1,Y,YI)'=$PIECE(BUT2,Y,YI) SET ERROR=1 ; ALLE FELDER BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG PRÜFEN . ; . IF VORG(4)=1 IF ERROR1'=1&(ERROR'=1) QUIT . IF VORG(6)'=1 WRITE "
"_$$^WWWTEXT(93)_": "_$PIECE($GET(^WWW120(0,$$^WWWUMLAU(FORM),1)),Y,1)_" / "_FORM_"
" ;FORMULARNAME . SET BUTNR="" . FOR SET BUTNR=$ORDER(^WWW124(0,FORM,SPRACHE,BUTNR)) QUIT:BUTNR="" DO . . SET ERROR="" . . SET ERROR1="" . . SET ERROR2="" . . SET BUT1=$GET(^WWW124(0,FORM,SPRACHE,BUTNR,1)) . . SET BUT2="" IF $DATA(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)) SET BUT2=$GET(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)) . . IF '$DATA(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)) SET ERROR=1 SET $PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,2)=$PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,2)+1 . . ; . . IF $PIECE(BUT1,Y,1)=$PIECE(BUT2,Y,1) IF $PIECE(BUT2,Y,60)'=1 SET ERROR=1 SET ERROR1=1 SET $PIECE(ERROR2,Y,1)=1 SET $PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,3)=$PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,3)+1 ;GLEICHE BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG . . IF $DATA(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)) DO . . . FOR YI=2:1 QUIT:$PIECE(BUT1,Y,YI,99)="" DO . . . . IF $PIECE(BUT1,Y,YI)'=$PIECE(BUT2,Y,YI) DO . . . . . SET ERROR = 1 . . . . . SET ERROR1 = YI . . . . . SET $PIECE(ERROR2,Y,YI) = YI . . . . . SET $PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,1) = $PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,1)+1 . . ; . . IF VORG(4)=1 IF ERROR'=1&(ERROR1'=1) QUIT . . IF VORG(6)=1 DO AUTOKOR QUIT . . SET ANZ=ANZ+1 . . DO ANZ1 . . DO ANZ2 . . QUIT . DO TEND . QUIT . ; ^^^ QUIT AUTOKOR ;AUTOMATISCHES KORIEGIEREN NEW BEZEICH,YFELDNEU,YFELDALT SET BEZEICH=$PIECE($GET(^WWW124(0,FORM,VORG(1),BUTNR,1)),Y,1) ;NUR BEI KOPIEREN SET YFELDALT=$GET(^WWW124(0,FORM,SPRACHE,BUTNR,1)) ;ALTEN STRING AUSLESEN SET YFELDNEU=YFELDALT ;ALT=NEU SET $PIECE(YFELDNEU,Y,1)=BEZEICH ;ALTE BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG ÜBERTRAGEN DO . NEW KEY,YFORM,YVOR . SET KEY=FORM_","_VORG(1)_","_BUTNR . SET YOK=$$^WWWSPEI("WWW124",KEY,YFELDNEU,1) QUIT ANZ ;AUFBAU ÜBERSCHRIFT IF VORG(6)=1 WRITE "" WRITE "
" WRITE "

" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,1) WRITE " ",$$^WWWTEXT(YNAME),", "_$$^WWWDATE(+$HOROLOG)_"

" ;PRÜFEN BUTTON QUIT ANZ1 ;ANZEIGEN EIGENSPRACHE IF ANZ=1 DO TSTART DO NL^WWWTAB DO NF^WWWTAB NEW YBACK SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" IF $PIECE(BUT1,Y,9)="" SET $PIECE(BUT1,Y,9)=$EXTRACT($PIECE(BUT1,Y,1))_".gif" WRITE "" ;BILD BUTTON WENN GIF IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(BUT1,Y,1))_".gif"=$PIECE(BUT1,Y,9) WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32312)_" >" ;BILD BUTTON WENN KEIN GIF WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB NEW YBACK SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE(BUT1,Y,1) ;BUTTON BEZEICHNUNG IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE " " DO ZW^WWWTAB NEW YBACK SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE SPRACHE ;SCHRACHE BED. WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB NEW YBACK SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE(BUT1,Y,4) ;BUTTONPOS WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB NEW YBACK SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE(BUT1,Y,3) ;BUTTONZEILE WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB WRITE " " DO EF^WWWTAB QUIT ANZ2 ;ANZEIGEN PRÜFSPRACHE ; 11-Dec-2006 shobby SRBR014286:Corrected GIF names. DO NF^WWWTAB NEW Z IF BUT2'="" DO . NEW YBACK . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . WRITE "" . IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" . IF $PIECE(BUT2,Y,9)="" SET $PIECE(BUT2,Y,9)=$EXTRACT($PIECE(BUT2,Y,1))_".gif" . WRITE "" ;BILD BUTTON WENN GIF . IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(BUT2,Y,1))_".gif"=$PIECE(BUT2,Y,9) WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32312)_" >" ;BILD BUTTON WENN KEIN GIF WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" IF BUT2'="" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB IF BUT2'="" DO . NEW YBACK . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . WRITE "" . IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" . WRITE $PIECE(BUT2,Y,1) ;BUTTON BEZEICHNUNG . IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" . IF BUT2'="" WRITE "" WRITE " " DO ZW^WWWTAB IF BUT2'="" DO . NEW YBACK . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE VORG(1) ;SCHRACHE BED. WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" IF BUT2'="" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB IF BUT2'="" DO . NEW YBACK . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" IF BUT2'="" WRITE $PIECE(BUT2,Y,4) ;BUTTONPOS WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" IF BUT2'="" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB IF BUT2'="" DO . NEW YBACK . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . WRITE "" IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE(BUT2,Y,3) ;BUTTONZEILE WRITE " " IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" IF BUT2'="" WRITE "" DO ZW^WWWTAB IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" IF ERROR1'="" IF ERROR2'="" IF VORG(5)'=1 DO . FOR Z=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(ERROR2,Y,Z,99)="" DO . .IF $PIECE(ERROR2,Y,Z)'="" WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("WWW124","D",$PIECE(ERROR2,Y,Z))_"
" IF VORG(5)=1 WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("WWW124","D",ERROR1) IF BUT2="" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(46) IF ERROR=1 WRITE "" WRITE " " DO ZW^WWWTAB ;ÄNDERN DATENSATZ IF ERROR=1 DO . IF BUT2'="" DO ;WENN NEUE VERSION VORHANDEN - CHECK 1 . .IF $PIECE(BUT1,Y,1)'=$PIECE(BUT2,Y,1) DO ;WENN BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG UNGLEICH . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE "" ;ALLE DATENFELDER ÄNDERN . . . WRITE "" . ; . .IF $PIECE(BUT1,Y,1)=$PIECE(BUT2,Y,1) IF $PIECE(BUT2,Y,60)'=1 DO ;GLEICHE BUTTONBEZEICHNUNG . . . NEW YBACK . . . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE "" ;ALLE DATENFELDER ÄNDERN . . . WRITE "" . . . ;BUTTON BEZEICHNUNG PRÜFEN ABSCHALTEN . . . NEW YBACK . . . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . . . WRITE "" . . . WRITE "" ;ALLE DATENFELDER ÄNDERN . . . WRITE "" . ; . IF BUT2="" DO . . NEW YBACK . . SET YBACK="WWWBUTCHECK1," . . WRITE "" . . WRITE "" ;ALLE DATENFELDER ÄNDERN . . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(33248) . . WRITE "" WRITE " " DO EF^WWWTAB DO EL^WWWTAB QUIT KOPF ; WRITE "" DO NL^WWWTAB NEW I FOR I=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(UES(1),Y,I,99)="" DO NHW^WWWTAB WRITE $PIECE(UES(1),Y,I)," " DO EH^WWWTAB FOR I=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(UES(2),Y,I,99)="" DO NHW^WWWTAB WRITE $PIECE(UES(2),Y,I)," " DO EH^WWWTAB DO EL^WWWTAB WRITE "" QUIT TSTART ;STARTEN TABLE DO START100^WWWTAB ;1 A DO KOPF SET YDDSATZ=0 QUIT TEND ;END TABLE IF VORG(6)'=1 WRITE "
" WRITE "" QUIT ERGEBNIS ;ERGEBNIS PRÜFUNG WRITE "

" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32391)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(154 )_"

" ;ERGEBNIS WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(199)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(86)_": "_$PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,2)_"
" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(199)_" "_$$^WWWFELDNAME("WWW124","D","1")_": "_$PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,3)_"
" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(199)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(33029)_": "_$PIECE(ERGEBNIS,Y,1)_"
" WRITE "
" QUIT NOCHMAL ;NOCHMAL DURCHLAUFEN, UM DIE ERGEBNISSE ANZUZEIGEN SET VORG(6)="" DO SORT DO ANZ DO CHECK DO ERGEBNIS QUIT
